title: Start
body:
So... new game?
->Yeah, looks like it.
->No, where?
What's the hook of it?
->Gays, everywhere.
->I'm just super exited about NPCs actively interacting with the player.
Oh neat, when can I play it?
->Right now!
->No clue tbh, it seems like a lot of work and I don't have that many resources, we'll see ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
->NEVER!
